title: Ticket #5635: [EC2] make ec2_keypair[_file] synonym for ec2_key_pair_file
description: Make these two submit file commands synonyms.
remarks:
2016-Aug-16 13:45:16 by tlmiller:
Deliberately not documenting, since we'd previously changed the documentation to match the code. This is only being done to avoid breaking submit files based on the old (wrong) documentation.
check_ins: 2016-Aug-16 13:43   Check-in [49015]: (#5635) Make ec2_key_pair[file] a synonym for ec2_keypair[file]. (By Todd L Miller )
creator: tlmiller
